books_2020.Title: The Golem and the Jinni (The Golem and the Jinni, #1)
books_2020.Author: Wecker, Helene
books_2020.Description: A magical tale of two supernatural creatures - a golem and a jinni - who form an unlikely friendship in 1899 New York, blending immigrant experiences with Middle Eastern folklore.

books_2020.Title: Conversion
books_2020.Author: Howe, Katherine
books_2020.Description: A modern prep school mystery parallels the Salem witch trials, exploring mass hysteria through two timelines connected by mysterious illnesses.

books_2020.Title: Dune (Dune Chronicles, #1)
books_2020.Author: Herbert, Frank
books_2020.Description: A sweeping sci-fi epic about Paul Atreides, heir to a noble family who becomes a messiah figure on the desert planet Arrakis, home to the universe's most valuable substance: spice.

books_2020.Title: Dune Messiah (Dune Chronicles, #2)
books_2020.Author: Herbert, Frank
books_2020.Description: The sequel to Dune explores the consequences of Paul Muad'Dib's rise to power as Emperor, showing the dark side of messianic rule.

books_2020.Title: A Cathedral of Myth and Bone
books_2020.Author: Howard, Kat
books_2020.Description: A collection of contemporary fantasy stories that reimagine myths, fairy tales, and legends with modern sensibilities.

books_2020.Title: The Old Drift
books_2020.Author: Serpell, Namwali
books_2020.Description: A multi-generational saga spanning Zambia's colonial past to its near future, blending history with magical realism.

books_2020.Title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
books_2020.Author: Chbosky, Stephen
books_2020.Description: An introspective teenager navigates friendship, love, and trauma through a series of letters in this poignant coming-of-age novel.

books_2020.Title: The Grace of Kings (The Dandelion Dynasty, #1)
books_2020.Author: Liu, Ken
books_2020.Description: An epic fantasy inspired by Chinese history, following two rebels who overthrow an empire but find their friendship tested by power.

books_2020.Title: Magic for Liars
books_2020.Author: Gailey, Sarah
books_2020.Description: A non-magical PI investigates a murder at a school for mages, confronting her complicated relationship with her magically gifted sister.

books_2020.Title: Vurt
books_2020.Author: Noon, Jeff
books_2020.Description: A hallucinatory journey through Manchester's underground, where people experience alternate realities through drug-like feathers.

books_2020.Title: Roses and Rot
books_2020.Author: Howard, Kat
books_2020.Description: Two sisters at an elite artists' retreat discover their mentors are fairies offering a dangerous bargain for success.

books_2020.Title: When We Were Vikings
books_2020.Author: MacDonald, Andrew David
books_2020.Description: A young woman with fetal alcohol syndrome imagines herself as a Viking warrior while navigating real-world challenges.

books_2020.Title: The Long Game (The Fixer, #2)
books_2020.Author: Barnes, Jennifer Lynn
books_2020.Description: A teenage fixer uncovers conspiracies at an elite Washington, D.C. prep school in this YA political drama.

books_2020.Title: Beach Read
books_2020.Author: Henry, Emily
books_2020.Description: Two rival authors - one writing literary fiction, the other romance - swap genres for the summer and unexpectedly find love.

books_2020.Title: Golden (Heart of Dread, #3)
books_2020.Author: Cruz, Melissa de la
books_2020.Description: The conclusion to a trilogy where survivors of climate disaster search for the mythical land of El Dorado.

books_2020.Title: Now I Rise (And I Darken Series, #2)
books_2020.Author: White, Kiersten
books_2020.Description: Lada Dracul continues her bloody quest to rule Wallachia, while her brother Radu serves Mehmed in Constantinople.

books_2020.Title: Bright We Burn (The Conqueror's Saga, #3)
books_2020.Author: White, Kiersten
books_2020.Description: The dramatic conclusion to the gender-swapped Vlad the Impaler retelling, where Lada's ruthless ambition meets its limits.

books_2020.Title: An Abundance of Katherines
books_2020.Author: Green, John
books_2020.Description: A child prodigy tries to mathematically model relationships after being dumped by 19 girls named Katherine.

books_2020.Title: We Were Liars
books_2020.Author: Lockhart, E.
books_2020.Description: A wealthy family's summer island holds dark secrets in this twisty tale of privilege, love, and memory loss.

books_2020.Title: Carry On (Simon Snow, #1)
books_2020.Author: Rowell, Rainbow
books_2020.Description: A chosen one wizard and his vampire roommate/enemy navigate magical school politics and their complicated feelings.

books_2020.Title: All the Ugly and Wonderful Things
books_2020.Author: Greenwood, Bryn
books_2020.Description: A controversial love story between a neglected girl and a kind ex-con in a world of meth labs and broken families.

books_2020.Title: Artemis
books_2020.Author: Weir, Andy
books_2020.Description: A smuggler on the first lunar city gets caught in a dangerous conspiracy in this heist story set in space.

books_2020.Title: The Darkest Part of the Forest
books_2020.Author: Black, Holly
books_2020.Description: Siblings in a town bordering faerie territory must awaken a sleeping prince to stop supernatural threats.

books_2020.Title: Daughter of Smoke & Bone (Daughter of Smoke & Bone, #1)
books_2020.Author: Taylor, Laini
books_2020.Description: An art student raised by demons discovers her connection to a centuries-old war between angels and chimaera.

books_2020.Title: Days of Blood & Starlight (Daughter of Smoke & Bone, #2)
books_2020.Author: Taylor, Laini
books_2020.Description: Karou becomes a resurrectionist for the chimaera army while navigating her complicated bond with the angel Akiva.

books_2020.Title: Dreams of Gods & Monsters (Daughter of Smoke & Bone, #3)
books_2020.Author: Taylor, Laini
books_2020.Description: The epic conclusion where angels, chimaera, and humans collide in a battle for multiple worlds.

books_2020.Title: Turtles All the Way Down
books_2020.Author: Green, John
books_2020.Description: A teen with OCD investigates a billionaire's disappearance while managing intrusive thoughts and new love.

books_2020.Title: The Fault in Our Stars
books_2020.Author: Green, John
books_2020.Description: Two teens with cancer fall in love while grappling with mortality in this heartbreaking romance.

books_2020.Title: Illuminate (The Illuminae Files, #1)
books_2020.Author: Kaufman, Amie
books_2020.Description: A corporate war spills into space as two teens escape their destroyed planet on a fleet with a rogue AI.

books_2020.Title: Wool (Silo, #1)
books_2020.Author: Howey, Hugh
books_2020.Description: In an underground silo where humanity survives a toxic world, a sheriff discovers disturbing truths about their society.

books_2020.Title: Mexican Gothic
books_2020.Author: Moreno-Garcia, Silvia
books_2020.Description: A socialite investigates her cousin's claims that her new husband's ancestral home is haunted by more than ghosts.

books_2020.Title: Invisible Planets: Contemporary Chinese Science Fiction in Translation
books_2020.Author: Liu, Ken
books_2020.Description: A collection showcasing China's vibrant SF scene, featuring futuristic visions from rising stars like Hao Jingfang and Chen Qiufan.

books_2020.Title: Night of Cake & Puppets (Daughter of Smoke & Bone, #1.5)
books_2020.Author: Taylor, Laini
books_2020.Description: A whimsical novella about violinist Zuzana's elaborate first date scheme with her would-be boyfriend Mik.

books_2020.Title: The Wicked + The Divine, Vol. 1: The Faust Act
books_2020.Author: Gillen, Kieron
books_2020.Description: Every 90 years, twelve gods incarnate as young pop stars - but they'll be dead in two years. A fan gets entangled in their drama.

books_2020.Title: The Wicked + The Divine, Vol. 2: Fandemonium
books_2020.Author: Gillen, Kieron
books_2020.Description: The god-popstars face backlash as their fandom turns violent and mysteries about the Pantheon's true nature deepen.

books_2020.Title: When Watched
books_2020.Author: Core, Leopoldine
books_2020.Description: Short stories exploring queer relationships and urban loneliness with raw, poetic intimacy.

books_2020.Title: Broken Stars: Contemporary Chinese Science Fiction in Translation
books_2020.Author: Liu, Ken
books_2020.Description: Sixteen cutting-edge stories representing China's new wave of SF, from cyberpunk to space opera and philosophical speculation.

books_2020.Title: Fangirl
books_2020.Author: Rowell, Rainbow
books_2020.Description: A shy fanfiction writer navigates college, first love, and family struggles while writing about her favorite book series.
